effect.shortEffect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.
effect.full: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

description.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
description.platinum: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
description.sun-moon: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.
